lead_paragraph: Mayor Donald Guardian said that unless the city received state aid, a shutdown would start on April 8 and was likely to last until at least May 2, when quarterly tax revenue is set to arrive.

headline.print_headline: Atlantic City May Suspend Some Services
headline.main: Atlantic City May Shut Down Nonessential Services for 3 Weeks

snippet: Mayor Donald Guardian said that unless the city received state aid, a shutdown would start on April 8 and was likely to last until at least May 2, when quarterly tax revenue is set to arrive.
abstract: Atlantic City Mayor Donald A Guardian warns that shutdown of all nonessential government services will start on April 8 if city does not receive state aid.
